structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXV. FEDERAL ENTERPRISE COMMUNITY COUNCIL

text.section:
Sec. 2-1022. Purpose.
The Council is created for the specific purposes of (a) advising the Board of County Commissioners (the" Board") on issues regarding the Federal Enterprise Community Strategic Plan (the "Plan") and (b) providing the mechanism by which the Plan's benchmarks and goals will be monitored, and performance evaluated.
